page.title: 13MUSICAL GROUPS
page.content: There are many musicians in Risca. in our class we have a picture of Risca Male Voice Choir in 1917. Their accompanist, Mrs. Hutchings, is now 92 years old and still lives in Commercial Street. She is the grandmother of Mrs. Gittings, our teacher. Many musical groups were begun in the chapels of the area. Bethany Baptist Chapel has a very strong musical background including a male choir, a Sunday school choir, a ladies choir and a jazz band. Risca has produced many famous musicians including Jennifer Rhys- Davies who has sung with the Welsh National Opera and Jonathan Watts, a brilliant organist. The Risca Phoenix Singers are still giving concerts and there are various senior citizens' choirs still singing.
